title.rendered: Gulf vs Emirates, International T20 League 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Gulf: James Vince (c), Chris Lynn, Shimron Hetmyer, Colin de Grandhomme, Carlos Brathwaite, David Wiese, Aayan Afzal Khan, Dominic Drakes, Chris Jordan, Sanchit Sharma, Tom Banton (wk)

Emirates: Andre Fletcher, Muhammad Waseem, Lorcan Tucker (wk), Nicholas Pooran, Kieron Pollard (c), Dan Mousley, Dwayne Bravo, Rashid Khan, Trent Boult, Zahoor Khan, Fazalhaq Farooqi

Pitch Report

Venue: Dubai International Cricket Stadium, Dubai

(Based on the last three games)

1st innings average score: 174

2nd innings average score: 166

Wickets per innings: 7

Type: Good for batting

Wins

Batting 1st: 67%

Batting 2nd: 33%

Also Read:

Ireland vs England, Women’s T20 World Cup, Fantasy Tips

South Africa vs New Zealand, Women’s T20 World Cup, 2023: Fantasy Tips

Fantasy Tips of The Day

James Vince’s top score (83*) of the season came at the very venue. All eyes yet again will be on him, as he has done the bulk of the scoring for Gulf. His 342 runs have come at an average of 42 and a strike rate of 136.

Emirates, however, have three star batters at their disposal. Kieron Pollard, Nicholas Pooran, and Muhammad Waseem have scored over 300 runs each at a combined average of 52.

In the league game between these teams, Chris Jordan (3 for 12 and a run out) was the captain of the Best11. All in all, he has sniped up 17 wickets at a strike rate of 10.3.

David Wiese is the only bowler from both teams to not go wicketless throughout the season. He has bagged 16 wickets, besides providing 30-run bonus twice with the bat down the order.

Dwayne Bravo featured in the Best11 in four consecutive games, striking especially at the death. He has scalped 12 wickets in 8 games.

In the last three games at the venue, three of four three-wicket hauls belonged to pacers.
